mapper.select: select p.id,p.name pname,d.name dname, d.parent_id ,i.type, p.io_setting_id from sdp_general p, sdp_general d, point_info i where p.parent_id=d.id and p.category='Point' and p.point_info_id=i.id and p.name like ? and d.name like ? and i.type=? and i.input=? and p.status>0 and d.status>0 and i.status>0 and d.category='Device'
